  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Treatment of kidney failure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Behandlung des Niereausfalls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traitement de panne de rein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tratamento da falha do kidney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trattamento di guasto del rene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επεξεργασία της αποτυχίας νεφρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tratamiento del incidente del riñón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a patient suffering from kidney failure after a heart attack. Doctors administer drugs to help restart his kidneys.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Doctor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Drugs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heart attack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kidney failure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">patient treatment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Patienten, der unter 
Niereausfall nach einem Inneren Angriff leidet. Doktoren üben 
Drogen aus, um zu helfen, seine Nieren wiederzubeginnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un patient souffrant de
la panne de rein après une crise cardiaque. Les médecins 
gèrent des drogues pour aider à relancer ses reins.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um paciente que sofre da
falha do kidney após um cardíaco de ataque. Os doutores 
administram drogas para ajudar reiniciar seus kidneys.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un paziente che 
soffre dal guasto del rene dopo un attacco di cuore. I medici 
amministrano le droghe per contribuire a ricominciare i suoi reni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν ασθενή που πάσχει 
από την αποτυχία νεφρών μετά από μια επίθεση καρδιών. Οι 
γιατροί διαχειρίζονται τα φάρμακα για να βοηθήσουν να 
επανεκκινήσουν τα νεφρά του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a paciente que sufre de
incidente del riñón después de un ataque del corazón. Los 
doctores administran las drogas para ayudar a recomenzar sus riñones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Doktor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerer Angriff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Niereausfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geduldige Behandlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Docteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Drogues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">panne de rein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trattamento paziente</string>
